articles.title: Google's Pixel 6 Pro is $119 off at Woot for today only - Engadget

articles.title: Fortnite creators are making studios to build ambitious — and branded — worlds - The Verge
articles.description: There are a growing number of groups forming full-time studios to create branded Fortnite Creative worlds. And it seems like we’re only in the early days of what might be possible.
